data.author: MreData

changelog.release_notes:
This watchface is not a just challenge, but an opportunity to think differently. Since Christiaan Huygens invented the modern clock in the 17th century, we have looked at time the same way. until now, we have seen a number and associated an event in which we should partake. why not think differently, think Lyfe. What this watchface allows is the opportunity release yourself from the stressful clutches of numbed time and give you a refreshing look at colored time. With 24 different colors to represent each hour and a flawless transitions, why not give Lyfe a chance and think different, think easy.

recommended system settings set 24-hour clock, however 12 will also work.
